    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Creates the player. Stores this Player in a global variable for access. Use getInstance to access.

    • Method Detail

      • setMovable

        public void setMovable(boolean movable)
        Enables/disables the players ability to move.
        Parameters:
        movable - True to enable movement, false to disable.

        public void addGold(int gold)
        Adds a specific amount of gold to the player
        Parameters:

      • removeGold

        public void removeGold(int gold)
        Removes a specific amount of gold from the player. Cannot go below 0 gold.
        Parameters:
        gold -

      • getInstance

        public static Player getInstance()
        Returns the single global instance of Player
        Returns:

      • enterTeleporter

        public void enterTeleporter(Map map)
        Attempts to use a teleporter at the player avatar's location. If none is found, this function does nothing.
        Parameters:
        map - Current map

      • attempInteraction

        public void attempInteraction()
        This method is called if the player presses the Interaction Key (enter). Attempts to pick up a collectible item if one is nearby. Does nothing, otherwise.

      • update

        public void update(Map map)
        Updates the player position and hitbox according to the user input. Attemps to find/use teleporters/events/enemies nearby.
        Parameters:
        map -

      • render

        public void render()
        Renders the player to the screen.
